name: FileStreamBot
description: A Pyrogram Telegram bot to Stream Telegram files to web. @GreyMatter_bots

ENV.description: Set this to True if you don't want to crash the bot

BANNED_CHANNELS.description: Put IDs of Banned Channels where bot will not work. You can add multiple IDs & separate with Space.

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Put a Public Channel Username, so every user have to Join that channel to use the bot. Must add bot to channel as Admin to work properly.

SLEEP_THRESHOLD.description: Floodwait Sleep timer. Read the readme for more info about this var

WORKERS.description: No. of workers that is to be assigned. Read the readme for more info about this var

PORT.description: Port that you want your webapp to be listened to. Read the readme for more info about this var

NO_PORT.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed. Read the readme for more info about this var

BIND_ADRESS.description: Read the readme for more info about this var

FQDN.description: Read the readme for more info about this var

SESSION_NAME.description: Session Name for Bot [ Add Moksh_b658 ]
